projects:
Responsible for building an UIKit ReactJS library with Storybook documentation and testing by @testing-library, which provided DOM APIs, such as Jest and Mocha + JSDOM. The Project goal was to provide styled components for screens so that they 
can be created on a faster and easier way.

Created projects from scratch using ReactJS, C# .NET Core, Git, AzureDevOps and Scrum. The Project goal was the creation of a framework that was used as a starting point for later projects. It uses the previous ReactJS UIKit.

Provided Software support and improvements on projects using ReactJS, C# .NET Core, Git, AzureDevOps and Scrum. The Project goal was to gather data on active Petroleum tanks for reports. It consumed an API to show each tank's levels and triggered notifications to certain user groups.

Provided Software support and improvements using MVC architecture, C# .NET, Entity Framework, SQL Server, JS, HTML, CSS, TFS, AzureDevOps ond Scrum. The Project goal was to manage trainings and documents for petroleum platform employees. The system is used globally and uses replication to synchronize applications across all platforms.
Provided visualization development using the D3.js and website development support working with HTML, CSS, Jekyll and Git.
